general.gigTitle: create your react,next js websites as a full stack developer

sellerCard.description: Hi everyone, I’m Mian Mohid Naeem, a data science enthusiast currently studying at the University of Management and Technology (UMT). I have a background in Computer Science, with a strong focus on ICS Statistics. I'm passionate about leveraging data-driven insights to solve real-world problems and contribute to innovative tech solutions. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new places, trying different cuisines, and spending quality time with loved ones. I’m excited to embark on this journey of learning and growth, and I’m eager to make a positive impact in the tech industry.

description.content:
****Please contact me before placing an order*****


Are you looking for a skilled Frontend React JS developer or full stack web developer who can transform designs and wireframes into high-quality, reusable, and responsive Full-Stack React/Next JS websites?


Congrats! You are at the right place.


Technologies I work with:


Frontend Stack


Languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript

UI: Tailwind CSS, Shadcn Ui

Framework: React, Next JS, Gatsby JS


Backend Stack

﻿

Backend Services: Supabase, Convex

Framework: ExpressJS,

Database: Mongo DB, Cockroch DB

Headless CMS: Strapi, Sanity

Tools: GitHub, Netlify, Vercel, Vs Code


Features:

Authentication

Responsiveness

Search Functionality

Content Management system

Backend Integration

CRUD Operations

API Integration

Analytics Integration

Security features


Why me:

Hi there, I'm a Full-Stack React/Next JS developer with 3+ years of experience in web application development. I've helped many people with their projects, and I'm always looking for new challenges.


  • 100% Satisfaction GUARANTEE
  • Super fast delivery
  • Fast communication



 I will not work with alcohol, gambling, or adult sites.

slide.name: create your react,next js websites as a full stack developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you develop our full website in React js?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Definitely, I can develop your full website in React and Next.js, integrating with backend services such as MongoDB, Sanity, and Strapi.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I have to provide you to start order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the source design file (PSD/Figma/XD/Sketch/AI/PNG), to start working on your project.

packageList.title: BASIC APP (1 Page)
packageList.description: Single Page React, Next JS, tailwind CSS, Application. (1-4 sections)

openGraph.title: create your react,next js websites as a full stack developer

reviews.comment: I've worked with him several times, and every experience has been outstanding. He understand my needs perfectly and always deliver work of exceptional quality. His professionalism, reliability, and attention to detail make him a trusted partner for my projects. I higly recommand

I recently hired Mohid for a React project, and I am extremely pleased with the results! From the start, Mohid demonstrated great skill and professionalism. He delivered high-quality code that was clean and well-structured, adhering to best practices in React development. His communication was excellent; he kept me updated throughout the process and was always open to feedback. Not only did he complete the project , but he also provided valuable insights that enhanced the final product. I highly recommend Mohid for anyone looking for a reliable and talented React developer. I look forward to working with him again in the future!

This is my fifth time working with Mohid Naeem. The project was complex because a lack of documentation on the library but he solved it perfectly. Mohid is highly professional and an exceptionally skilled programmer. He delivered an excellent product and the quality of that software was outstanding. I’m more than satisfied. I will definitely be returning for future projects!

This is my fourth time ordering from Mohid Naeem, and once again, I'm extremely satisfied. He is consistently professional and responsive. The plugin I received is nicely done. I'll be returning soon! 🙂

This is my third time ordering from Mohid Naeem and once again, he exceeded my expectations. I was struggling to integrate a tool into my application and reached out to him for help. He quickly resolved the issue, saving me a ton of time. Now, I can finally deploy my application thanks to his expertise. I’m incredibly grateful and will be coming back 100%. Thank you so much! 🙂

seller_response.comment: I'm so glad I could help! Thank you for your continued trust.
